title: Manohari Emerald & Diamond Chowker Haaram with South Sea Pearls
materials: Natural South Sea Pearls (34.95 carats); Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Intricate floral design with delicate diamond setting. Features two pear-shaped emeralds set within diamond halos, one in the choker itself and another in the detachable pendant. The pendant is adorned with a detailed floral pattern, meticulously crafted to enhance the emerald's brilliance. The Chowker border has ornate diamond flowers and hanging South Sea Pearls (Motulu).
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for Seemantham or traditional family functions.
description: This Chowker Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and traditional South Indian design. The combination of sparkling diamonds, vibrant emeralds (Pachalu), and lustrous South Sea pearls creates a timeless piece that will be cherished for generations. The detachable pendant offers versatility, allowing the piece to be worn as a simple choker or a more elaborate haaram. It's a valuable addition to any bride's trousseau and a cherished family heirloom.
